tldr: Affected versions of the package suffer from resource leaks due to a flaw in WebSocket connection handling. WebSocket connections remain open indefinitely, even when the application does not expect them. As a result, these unintended connections can consume system resources, potentially leading to performance degradation and other unintended behavior.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `@hono/node-ws` library to the patch version.
